itunes:title: Episode 1122 - JP Sears
title: Episode 1122 - JP Sears
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
description:
Comedian JP Sears joins the show to talk about his new standup special "Please Censor This", Adidas dropping Kanye West after all of his insane rants, the Fetterman vs. Dr. Oz debate, if Cari Lake could be the next Vice President, and the future of Twitter under Elon Musk.


Check out JP Sears' new standup special "Please Censor This"
